messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Test message
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry again... it was time to update the footer now that the website is up and we have the message board.  Unfortunately, the link to the lj is unstable (won t
messages.messageBody:
Sorry again... it was time to update the footer now that the website is up and we have the message board. Unfortunately, the link to the lj is unstable (won't link from a message, though I can type in the URL and it comes up), so I changed it to the secondary URL. The only way I can test it is to send out a message to the list. Don't mean to fill up inboxes with junk.

phil (picking up the sake bottles that've been thrown at her)



---------------------------------
Do you Yahoo!?
Friends. Fun. Try the all-new Yahoo! Messenger

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
